name: Managed Service for PostgreSQL — Cluster overview

targets.query: alias({name="postgres-is_alive", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}, "{{host}}")
alias(series_sum("name", "pooler-xact_count"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Transactions")
alias(series_sum("pooler-query_count"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Statements")
alias({name="postgres-is_primary", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}, "{{host}}")

alias(series_sum("host", {name="postgres-replication_lag", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "{{host}}")

top_max(5, alias(series_sum("name", {service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="pg_backend_read_bytes_client_backend_*", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "{{name}}"))

top_max(5, alias(series_sum("name", {name="pg_backend_read_bytes_*", host="*", name!="pg_backend_read_bytes_client_backend_*", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host"}), "{{name}}"))

top_max(5, alias(series_sum("name", {name!="pg_backend_write_bytes_client_backend_*", name="pg_backend_write_bytes_*", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "{{name}}"))

top_max(5, alias(series_sum("name", {name="pg_backend_write_bytes_client_backend_*", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "{{name}}"))

top_max(5, alias(series_sum("name", {name!="pg_backend_cpu_client_backend_*", name="pg_backend_cpu_*", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "{{name}}"))

top_max(5, alias(series_sum("name", {name="pg_backend_cpu_client_backend_*", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "{{name}}"))

top_max(5, alias({name="postgres_wait_event**", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", query_type!="-", database="*"}, "{{query_type}}"))
top_max(5, alias({name="postgres_wait_event**", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}, "{{name}}"))
alias(series_sum({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="disk-free_bytes_/var/lib/postgresql", host="*", dc!="by_node|by_host", node="primary"}), "Disk free")
alias(series_sum({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="disk-used_bytes_/var/lib/postgresql", host="*", dc!="by_node|by_host", node="primary"}), "Disk used")
alias(series_avg("pooler-avg_xact_time"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Average Transaction Time")
alias(series_avg("pooler-avg_query_time"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Average Statement Time")
trunc(alias(series_max("pooler-query_0.999"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host"}), "99.9%"))
trunc(alias(series_max("pooler-query_0.99"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host"}), "99%"))
trunc(alias(series_max("pooler-query_0.9"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host"}), "90%"))
trunc(alias(series_max("pooler-query_0.75"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host"}), "75%"))
trunc(alias(series_max("pooler-query_0.5"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host"}), "50%"))
alias(series_max("pooler-transaction_0.999"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host"}), "99.9%")
alias(series_max("pooler-transaction_0.99"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host"}), "99%")
alias(series_max("pooler-transaction_0.9"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host"}), "90%")
alias(series_max("pooler-transaction_0.75"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host"}), "75%")
alias(series_max("pooler-transaction_0.5"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "50%")
alias(series_sum("pooler-used_clients"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Clients")
alias(series_sum("pooler-used_servers"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Servers")
alias({name="pooler-is_alive", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}, "{{host}}")
alias(series_sum({name="/porto/io_write", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Write bytes")
alias(series_sum({name="/porto/io_read", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Read bytes")
alias(series_sum({name="/porto/io_limit", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Limit")

alias(series_sum({name="/porto/io_read", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}+{name="/porto/io_write", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Total")
alias(series_sum("host", {service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="/porto/io_ops", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "{{host}}")
alias(series_sum({name="/porto/net_rx_bytes", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Received")
alias(series_sum({name="/porto/net_tx_bytes", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Sent")
alias(trunc(series_sum({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="/porto/net_rx_packets", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"})), "Received")
alias(trunc(series_sum({name="/porto/net_tx_packets", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"})), "Sent")

alias(series_avg("name", {name="/porto/cpu_wait|/porto/cpu_usage|/porto/cpu_usage_system", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "{{name}}")
alias(series_sum({name="postgres-log_errors", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Log Errors")

alias(series_sum({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="disk-path-size_pgsql_tmp_bytes", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "Temp Files")
alias(series_sum({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="disk-path-size_pg_wal_bytes", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "WAL size")
alias(series_sum("pooler-total_tcp_connections"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", node="primary|replica", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "TCP connections")
top_max(5, alias(series_sum("name", {name="*_pg_database_size", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="*", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary"}), "{{name}}"))
